description: This Python source file contains functions to configure Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) for a Flask application based on environment variables. It includes parsing of a comma-separated list of origins and setting up the CORS policies, with a default fallback for local development.

methods.name: Optional[List[str]] parse_origin_list(value: Optional[str])
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string of origins into a list of trimmed origins, or None if input is empty.

methods.name: configure_cors_from_env(app)
methods.description: Configures CORS for a Flask app using the 'FRONTEND_APP_ORIGIN' environment variable, defaulting to localhost if not set.
